results.t: TALK definition and meaning | Collins English Dictionary
results.p: 7 days ago — 23 meanings: 1. to express one's thoughts, feelings, or desires by means of words (to); speak (to) 2. to communicate or.
to communicate or exchange ideas, information, etc., by speaking: to talk about poetry. to consult or confer: Talk with your adviser. to chatter or prate.
Talking is what we do when we speak words out loud. Your teacher probably forbids talking when students are taking a test. Shh!
